mapper.select: SELECT tnw.id, tnw.audio, tnw.word_picture1, tnw.word_picture2, tnw.word_picture3, tnw.word_picture4, tnw.word_picture5 FROM tn_word tnw LEFT JOIN tn_phonefic_test tnp ON tnw.id = tnp.word_id WHERE tnp.phonefic_id = #{phoneficId}
SELECT p.audio, COUNT(1) FROM tn_phonefic_test pt Left JOIN tn_phonefic p ON pt.phonefic_id = p.id
SELECT w.audio, pt.word FROM tn_phonefic_test pt INNER JOIN tn_word w ON pt.word_id = w.id AND pt.is_delete = 0 AND pt.state = 0 AND pt.phonefic_id = #{phoneficId}
SELECT tnp.id, tnp.audio, tur.create_time FROM tn_user_record tur LEFT JOIN tn_phonefic tnp ON tnp.id = tur.phonefic_id WHERE tur.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY tur.create_time DESC LIMIT 1
